title: Understanding the Graph Type
text: A graphical representation of data where individual data points are plotted on a two-dimensional graph is often used to show the relationship between two variables.

title: Identifying the Graph
text: This type of graph is useful for identifying patterns, trends, and correlations between the two variables.

title: Common Graph Types
text: Consider the common types of graphs: Scatter Plot, Bar Chart, Histogram, and Line Graph. Each serves a different purpose in data visualization.

title: Focus on Data Points
text: The graph type in question specifically plots individual data points, not bars or lines connecting points.

title: Choosing the Correct Graph
text: The correct term for a graphical representation of data where individual data points are plotted on a two-dimensional graph is a Scatter Plot.
